评论概述: Can’t tell but it looked gorgeous
评论详情: Loved this.its great. Really pretty
I love this harness it’s my first other similar items had complaints about not wrapping all the way around. I’m 34bra size 6/8 jeans this fit with room.

评论概述: Cute belt but not plus size
评论详情: Not truly plus size. My waist is 31 n I barely has any extra room
Cheap - and too big. Threw it out

I'm 5'10" and the bright straps still half way down my back on the longest setting. I wish each strap had more adjustability. White trying to make it fit, one of the straps broke. Not great quality, but I did get a couple of wears out of it.
The belt came with buckles that were different from what was pictured. The straps were also very thin. Returning this item.
This item is made of mediocre materials but it fits well. Size 16-18 , 5’10. It is a fun accessory for the price point.
Used for a female Nanami cosplay it isnt plus size friendly so i had to hook the ends differently than designed but it worked

Bought for my 24yr old daughter and she LOVES it. Can wear with  leggings, dress, or sweaters because of the style. She said it's very comfortable. Only wished it had come with a instruction picture but she figured it out.

quality, fit, value is all there! bought this for a halloween costume but highly considering getting it in black for casual wear! it fit great, im 5’8 around 180lbs and it wrapped around enough and wasn’t unflattering. 10/10
Doesn’t fit well at all, very confusing to put on. Weird design. Not ideal. Quality is fine I guess. It’s just not a great product. Not what I was looking for.

I’m a size 16, 34” waist and this belt would only go around once and not buckle. I couldn’t find a way to “make it work” like another reviewer mentioned doing. It just looked like I had a belt that was broken. My photo is strictly to show true color.  Harness would be super cute if it fit!

While I will definitely get use of this for some street wear and club looks, I did get it in light brown specifically for the ren faire! My over-dress had some strings in the middle to snatch it in a bit, but I wasn't going to be wearing a corset or anything (too dang hot!) and adding this harness gave me the ability to add a bit of a "belt" with a bit more flair! I purchased separately a pair of skirt hikes that are a near match in color that I slipped on the long criss-cross pieces before buckling up, and it was perfect for carrying and appearance! For me, this made it so I could carry fewer things total, and less in a bag and not need a backpack! And again, super cute!  The one-size did work out for me, I have a short torso, larger bust, and can adjust the waist for the smallest part, to accommodate any bloating or issues with my tummy very easily!
Imma size 20 only wrapped around 1&1/2 times instead the 2 x’s the picture shows

It was complicated to put it together but once you figure out out it works. It’s pretty tight on me in the belly area. I am 180 lbs, 5’4 .. stomach size is decent. I haven’t Wore it out yet just tried it on w outfits. Dresses seem to fit better w it. If you want this to spice up your dress, get it.
I’m a 28” waist and got it around BARELY 2x. :( faux material is definitely lower quality. I don’t see this belt lasting very long.

I am a size 14-16 and wasn't able to buckle up. Purchased as part of a cosplay and was able to just tuck the belt into itself so worked well enough. Not a high quality material but for the price wasn't really expecting much.

I’m a 34G-36DDD, wear large on most shirts. Chest isn’t the problem, below it the strings are too long. So it does feel tight  but it does fit. Would recommend for anyone larger than a larger. But still super cute and like the photo.

Super cute belt and although it was kind of complicated to figure out, it is SUPER flattering and cute on. Didn’t come with directions but it’s got the suspender at the back so I used that as a guide to figure it out.  I’m 5’11”, 175 lbs, a size 6-8, and it fit very well with tons of left over belt length at the waist. This can fit a large range of body sizes. I would choose this one over the others this brand sells.  I got it in black and I hope to buy more colors in the future!

评论概述: Decent waist belt for the price.
评论详情: Couldn’t loop it twice around my 34” waist so not very plus friendly. I returned it but I still think it was nice.
This harness has so many straps and clasps! Its wrap around design is super cute on and easy to figure out due to the only ends have clips on them. Very flattering and worth the price!

I don't know if this product had been worn already or what, but the belt holes were worn and torn. It was so thin and flimsy material, that it could have even been ripped in shipping. Even if you were really gentle with this, it would rip. I also measured the straps and they are shorter than advertised.
